title: UAE to Oman by car this Eid al Fitr? Visa, insurance, border fees explained
summary_full: Eid Al Fitr 2026 offers a perfect four-day holiday window for UAE residents to embark on a scenic road trip to Oman. Planning ahead for border procedures, visas and car insurance is essential for a smooth journey. Several border crossings provide access to Oman's diverse landscapes, making it an ideal and affordable getaway.
